name: Judgment
description: You send powerful missiles of pure energy to rain down on any creature in an 80 foot circle, centered on a point in range. Any creature caught in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 5d6 + MOVE damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. The type of the damage depends on the kind of plate the user is holding.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.

effect.name: An appealing move that can be used repeatedly without boring the audience.
effect.effect: No penalty applied for repeating the move.
